contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 12, 1989 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Championship Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Championship Section) 1 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-championship-sec
An Epic Symphony
Stantonbury Leisure Centre Sports Hall, Milton Keynes Bands played an entertainment programme including Elegy from An Epic Symphony. 14 bands competed.
Best Instrumentalist: Soprano, Deritend Luton. 1st Prize: £400.00 (Mk Co-Op trophy) 2nd Prize: £200.00 (Legel & General trophy) 3rd Prize: £100.00 (Yardles trophy) 4th Prize: £50.00
Aug. 29, 2010, 11:47 a.m. March 1, 2013, 4:54 p.m.
1 Hyundai Heart of England Stephen Roberts
2 Aveley Band Martin Heartfield
3 Luton Band Lyn Morgan
4 Ibstock Brick Brass Bryan Hurdley
Unknown Result Ratby Co-operative Band Don Blakeson
Unknown Result City of Cambridge Brass Band Charles Shipp
Unknown Result Brackley and District Band Guy Bennett

Unknown Result Towcester Studio Band Peter Wain

Unknown Result Welwyn Garden City Band Guy Bennett
